Thank you for using Health Buddy! We are working hard to improve our app and to bring you more convenience when accessing SingHealth’s services.
In this version, enjoy these NEW features:
-Home Screen – fresh, new look!
-Personal Profile
-Test Results
-My Visit (Beta Trial for selected SGH patients)
